subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Adriana's Files/thanksfortalking.mp3 
  Uploaded by : adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...> 
  Description : Me (in Romanian, to my grandparents): Thanks for talking.  My grandmother's voice: Yeah! And then faintly in man's voice: Thanks for      And then loudly slow choppy: Talk - king.  That's the first time I ever spoke in one language and got a reply in another one.  Wow, mama Jeni, didn't know you knew English :) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Adriana%27s%20Files/thanksfortalking.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.html
Regards,

adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...>
